cvrfdoc.DocumentTitle: FortiWeb - OS command injection due to direct input interpolation in API controllers

DocumentPublisher.ContactDetails: Fortinet PSIRT Contact: Email: vulnwatch@fortinet.com Website: fortiguard.com/psirt-pgpkey

DocumentNotes.Note: An improper neutralization of special elements used in an OS command ('OS Command Injection') vulnerability [CWE-78] in FortiWeb may allow an authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary code or commands via crafted HTTP requests to ApplicationDelivery, JsonProtection and WebProtection controllers.
FortiWeb version 6.4.1 and below FortiWeb version 6.3.16 and below FortiWeb version 6.2.6 and below

Upgrade to the upcoming FortiWeb version 7.0.0 or above Upgrade to FortiWeb version 6.4.2 or above Upgrade to FortiWeb version 6.3.17 or aboveUpgrade to FortiWeb version 6.2.7 or above Fix for FortiWeb versions 6.1, 6.0, 5.9 to be confirmed.
Internally discovered and reported by Mattia Fecit of Fortinet Product Security team.
